articles.title: World's largest aircraft, Google co-founder's Pathfinder 1 tests flight - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Pathfinder 1 features modern-day technologies such as fly-by-wire controls, electric motors, and lidar sensing.
articles.content: The Pathfinder 1 is capable of vertical takeoff and landing (VTOL) and can attain speeds of up to 75 miles (120 kilometers) per hour thanks to twelve electric motors and four fin rudders. The airship… [+1207 chars]
